body:
The other person who will receive this application is known as the respondent.

(i) The {respondents, select, 1{name} undefined{name} other{names}} should be as {respondents, select, 1{it appears} undefined{it appears} other{they appear}} on the birth certificate (including any middle names)
heading: {respondents, select, 1{Enter the respondent’s name} other{Enter the respondents’ names} undefined{Enter the respondent’s name}}
